description: This file defines a React functional component 'PlanSelection' that provides a UI for users to select between 'Free' and 'Pro / Business' plans. It manages plan selection state via a custom hook 'useStore', renders plan details with accessibility features, and routes to onboarding upon selection.

methods.name: handleChoose
methods.description: Handles the user's plan selection by updating the store and changing the window location hash to trigger navigation.

methods.name: Check
methods.description: A React component that displays individual feature items with accessibility labels and icons, indicating whether a feature is gated or available.
